Package gpjl.random

Class IntegerGenerator

java.lang.Object
gpjl.random.IntegerGenerator
public class IntegerGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
The IntegerGenerator generates pseudo-random Integers, while avoiding Duplication if requested.
Since:
0.3
See Also:
Random

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    IntegerGenerator​(IntegerRange range)
    Initializes Range and produces a Random object with Random().
    IntegerGenerator​(IntegerRange range, long seed)
    Initializes Range and produces a Random object with Random(long).
    IntegerGenerator​(IntegerRange range, java.util.Random random)
    Initializes Range and Random object.

  • Method Details

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if all Integers within the Range have been generated already.
      Returns:
      true if all booleans are true, false otherwise

    • nextInt

      public int nextInt​(boolean avoidDoubling)
      Generates a new Integer.
      Parameters:
      avoidDoubling - whether number repetition is dissallowed
      Returns:
      a new pseudo-randomly generated Integer within Range

    • resetInts

      public void resetInts()
      Resets the boolean array to all-false and the appropiate size.
